sn14.31:1.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn14.31:1.3: ‘ko nu kho pathavidhatuya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam;
sn14.31:1.4: ko apodhatuya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam;
sn14.31:1.5: ko tejodhatuya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranam;
sn14.31:1.6: ko vayodhatuya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan’ti?
sn14.31:2.2: ‘yam kho pathavidhatum paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam pathavidhatuya assado;
sn14.31:2.3: yam pathavidhatu anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, ayam pathavidhatuya adinavo;
sn14.31:2.4: yo pathavidhatuya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam pathavidhatuya nissaranam.
sn14.31:2.7: yam vayodhatum paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam vayodhatuya assado;
sn14.31:2.8: yam vayodhatu anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, ayam vayodhatuya adinavo;
sn14.31:2.9: yo vayodhatuya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam vayodhatuya nissaranam’.
sn14.31:3.1: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, imasam catunnam dhatunam evam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam na abbhannasim, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti paccannasim.
sn14.31:4.1: Yato ca khvaham, bhikkhave, imasam catunnam dhatunam evam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannasim, athaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti paccannasim.
sn14.31:4.3: ‘akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
